description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon Breakfast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Breakfast,Pescatarian,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Tomato,Sesame free,Salmon
name: Smoked Salmon Breakfast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 roma tomatoes, seeded and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the bread with olive oil, then cook on a hot ribbed grill until lightly blackened. Season generously with salt and pepper.

Combine the cream cheese, garlic, horseradish cream and lemon juice in a bowl, then beat until smooth. Season with salt, then fold in the chives. Spread on the bread. Mix the cucumber, tomato and bail then spoon on top.
Arrange the salmon on top, then serve with baby leaf salad.
